de.apporiented.hermesftp.server.impl

Class SecureFtpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.apporiented.hermesftp.utils.AbstractAppAwareBean
      • de.apporiented.hermesftp.server.AbstractFtpServer
        • de.apporiented.hermesftp.server.impl.SecureFtpServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BeanConstants, FtpConstants, FtpEventListener, FtpServer, Runnable, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    public class SecureFtpServer
extends AbstractFtpServer
    Implementation of a FTP server that supports communication via implicit SSL. Note that implicit SSL is not covered by any RFC.
    Author:
    Lars Behnke
